examples.example: 我们要珍惜时间努力学习，不断提升自己的能力。

translate.english: We should cherish the time to study hard and constantly improve our own abilities.

examples.example: 我们应该保持积极的心态努力学习各种知识，不断充实自己。

translate.english: We should maintain a positive attitude to study all kinds of knowledge hard and continuously enrich ourselves.

examples.example: 我们通过不断学习来充实自己，让生活更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: We enrich ourselves through continuous learning to make life more colorful.
